name: Pool Empire - 8 Ball & Snooker
description:
【Developer Notes】

I am a billiards lover, before making this game, I tried many times to find a life-like 2D pool game, but failed.
Undeniably, I've come cross some fine 3D pool games, but, personally, I prefer 2D to 3D. Because I find that it's very hard for players to estimate the distance between balls and control the force of the cue when playing 3D pool game. 3D really makes me feel dizzy!
Since I couldn't find a satisfied 2D pool game, I decided to make one myself! After working together with other pool lover developers, Pool Empire came out!
Fortunately, the game physics wins players' recognition, Pool Empire is tagged as【The Most Real 2D Pool Game】.
Leting players enjoy a real pool game is our original intention, and this goal makes us keep trying and persevering.


【The most real pool game】

Wanna become a billiards pro player? Download and play free POOL EMPIRE now! It’s an arena for ball pool lovers, presenting the most real 2D multiplayer cue game. You can challenge players from all over the world online, and enjoy yourself becoming a pro player.


【Game Features】

1.1 vs 1 - Play with opponents from all over the world, and win awesome rewards.
2. Story Mode - Challenge top billiards pro players and become the best
3. 14-1 Mode - Refine your pool game skills, strengthen your scoring ability
4.Tournament - Fight for the champion out of 8 players, and win trophies
5. Friends - Challenge friends anytime, anywhere and show off your skills
6. Snooker - Authentic snooker rules
7. High Quality Graphics & Physics - The most real side spin effects
8. Exclusive Items - Customize your cues and tables, even level them up
9. Other Game Mode - 9 ball and 3-cushion are under plan

Download Pool Empire NOW!
